title: Kubernetes Training Basic Training Series
description: This series is presented by BoxBoat on Youtube and in our blog.

courses.title: Kubernetes Basic Training: Module 1 - Intro To Docker
courses.description: In this lab, we will examine the Docker CLI and execute our first container.

courses.title: Kubernetes Basic Training: Module 2 - Intro To Kubernetes
courses.description: Quick Demo of the Kubernetes UI and an example application called Vote

courses.title: Kubernetes Basic Training: Module 3 - Kubernetes Pods
courses.description: Demo of how to run containers in Pods on Kubernetes

courses.title: Kubernetes Basic Training: Module 4 - Kubernetes Deployments
courses.description: Demo of how to run Pods using different deployment types
